data.name: Gangs of Space - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The complete soundtrack of the game Gangs of Space, composed by -oTo-.

Tracklist


01 - Main Menu (2:58)
02 - Motherbase I (7:01)
03 - Lost in Space (5:54)
04 - Unknown Universe (4:16)
05 - Lone Explorer (4:07)
06 - Death I (1:08)
07 - First Launch (2:58)
08 - Warp Traveler (3:55)
09 - Asteroid Scraps (3:38)
10 - First Encounter (6:19)
11 - The Boss (2:54)
12 - Squad Team (4:52)
13 - Adventure Calling (6:53)
14 - Motherbase II (3:12)
15 - Serious Threat (4:50)
16 - Bad Guys Incoming (3:20)
17 - Death II (0:48)

A total of 17 tracks (1:09:01) in high-quality 320 kbps MP3.

How to listen?


You can play the soundtrack directly in the Steam music player.

You can also find the MP3 files in the "Soundtrack" folder in the game installation location, and play them directly in any music player.

data.short_description: Complete soundtrack of the game Gangs of Space, composed by -oTo-.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: Dual core 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Pixel Shader 3.0 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ping < 500ms to Europe
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad core 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Pixel Shader 3.0 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ping < 300ms to Europe

  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8

  • Graphics: Pixel Shader 3.0 compatible

  • Additional Notes: Ping < 500ms to Europe

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Dual core 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Pixel Shader 3.0 compatible
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ping < 500ms to Europe
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
